group_1.textCenter: [chara:105201:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]The rice is back! What a huge revival!!
Ahh…I'm all choked up. The graceful, blessed@rains have brought back the greenery!

group_1.textLeft: …I'd say it was less graceful and more like@a torrential downpour…

group_1.textRight: Hey, I'm just glad there wasn't any damage.
The village was safe thanks to us building@that canal!
I found these bamboo shoots in that place@you'd mentioned!
Here, I'll share them with you.

group_1.textLeft: Woah! Those shoots look so yummy!

group_1.textRight: Lady Toyo!@I picked some bamboo shoots too!

group_1.textLeft: Please take some if you'd like!
[chara:105201:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]B-bamboo shoots all around me…@This feels like paradise on earth…
This isn't exactly my idea of paradise.

group_1.textRight: I guess hers is just a huge grove of bamboo.
She must be here to give us the result@of her test!

group_1.textCenter: Toyo… It appears you did well.

group_1.textLeft: Th-thank you very much, my lady.

group_1.textRight: But…from what I've heard, you went barging into@the village without thinking things through.
You neglected to gather information@in advance.
Had you been aware of the need for a canal,@construction would have been much easier…
And had you told the village that you were here@to build a canal to begin with,
they wouldn't have been so distrustful of you@in this instance.
You are lacking in tact. That is something@we'll need to work on in the time to come.
Good for you, Toyo!@You've been accepted as a candidate!

group_1.narration: What is that…? I can hear something.
Is this a song…?
I feel like I've heard it before,@a long, long time ago.
This song…and being held in someone's arms…
―Himiko―@Are you awake, Toyo?
―Toyo―@L-Lady Himiko…?!@I'm… How did I…?
―Himiko―@Don't try to move.@You suddenly collapsed, don't you remember?
―Toyo―@U-um… Where's Rena and her friends…?
―Himiko―@They're off to fetch you some water.@Stay put for now.
I couldn't believe it… Lady Himiko…@Lady Himiko was…letting me sleep on her lap…
I couldn't help but feel a little nervous, so why…?@…Somehow, I felt so calm.
I had no idea such a warm and peaceful place@could possibly exist.
―Himiko―@...I had to reward you somehow.@
―Toyo―@Ree…ward?
―Himiko―@You worked so hard…@You deserve it, don't you?
―Toyo―@...
―Toyo―@C-can I… M-may I ask for something really precious…?
―Himiko―@*Chuckle* Something precious?@What might you ask for…?
―Himiko―@...Go ahead.
―Toyo―@Th-that's…
―Toyo―@I want you…to stroke my head.
―Himiko―@...
―Himiko―@Is that…really all you want…?
―Toyo―@Yes…that's all.
―Himiko―@S-surely…there must be something more you want?@Beautiful garments or perhaps a necklace…
―Toyo―@No, I don't need anything like that…@I don't… No, I…
―Toyo―@I just want my mama to stroke my head@like all the other kids.
―Himiko―@...
―Toyo―@Whenever I saw other kids my age…@getting patted on the head for doing a good job…
―Toyo―@I always thought…it looked so nice…
―Toyo―@I didn't have a mama, though… Just a gramma…@I wanted my mama to do it.
―Toyo―@I think it would be…really nice…
―Himiko―@...
―Himiko―@...How is that?
―Toyo―@It feels so good…
―Himiko―@Is that so…?@I'm not used to doing this sort of thing…
―Toyo―@Really…?
―Toyo―@Oh…I see…@This has gotta be a dream, right?
―Toyo―@I was able to use the Spirit Arts to help everyone…@I have friends I cherish…
―Toyo―@And I'm getting my head stroked like this…
―Toyo―@...Everything I thought I could never have…@It's all here…
―Himiko―@...
―Toyo―@...Hey, Lady Himiko.
―Toyo―@Are you…my mama?
―Himiko―@...
―Himiko―@...I won't blame you for hating me.@It's only natural after I neglected you for so long.
―Toyo―@Mama…it looks like there's something@even you don't know…
―Toyo―@Mama…I love you.@I love you so much…
―Himiko―@...
―Toyo―@I'm so happy…that I have a mama…@And that my mama is…a dig-nuh-fied lady like you…
―Toyo―@I've…gotta be…the luckiest person…in the world…
―Himiko―@*Sob* *Hic*
―Toyo―@What's wrong, Mama…?
―Himiko―@No need…for you to open your eyes…@Just go to sleep.
―Himiko―@You've…done a wonderful job, Toyo.@Now get some rest…
Mama stroking my head,@and singing to me in a whisper…
Yeah, that's right… I was listening to this song,@being held by her, hearing her lullaby…
A long, long time ago…when I was with Mama…
I can hear Rena, Kaede,@and Momoko's voices from afar.
Mama's song continues to ring through the air,@enshrouding me in her voice…@With the chorus of many cicadas.
Even with my eyes closed,@I can clearly perceive the shape of the sun…@It's a premonition that makes my heart race,@drifting at the bottom of the hot wind.
…This was summer.
